document_data.mainbody:
Day of the Devil is an adventure module set in the Forgotten Realms using the Dungeons & Dragons 5 edition ruleset. It is part of the Avernus Rising series of adventures published for the D&D Adventurers League. It focuses on Baldurs Gate, and is an adventure designed for 1- to 4-level characters. It is part three of Betrayal is in the Blood.
